name: 4x4 Off-Roaders
overview: 4×4 Off-Roaders is a cancelled Gameboy Advance racing game that was in development by Small Rockets in 2001. The game was powered by a nice voxel 3D graphic engine, something that was not usual on the 2D-centric GBA console. We dont know why the game was never released, but it’s possible that Small Rockets never found a publisher.
